hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that Sheik waits in the #Death Mountain Crater# to teach #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that amidst flames in #Kakariko Village#, Sheik gives #a Red Rupee#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that #the Ice Cavern# hoards #the Sun's Song#.
hinted_locations: Ice Cavern GS Push Block Room

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that the #Shadow Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that a #fountain wall# hides the #Happy Mask Shop#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #the Shadow Temple# hoards #a Gold Skulltula Token#.
hinted_locations: Shadow Temple GS Invisible Blades Room

GC (Maze).text: They say that the #Ice Cavern# corridors ring with #the Keaton Mask#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that ##Zora's River## has #0# major items.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that #the Ice Cavern# is on the way of the hero.
hinted_locations: Ice Cavern GS Spinning Scythe Room

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that a spider behind a #gate in the Water Temple# holds #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

HC (Malon).text: They say that #the Weird Egg# can be found at #Zora's Fountain#.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that in the #central rooms of the well# spiders hold...^ #the Water Temple Boss Key# and #a Gold Skulltula Token#.
hinted_locations: Bottom of the Well GS West Inner Room
Bottom of the Well GS East Inner Room

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #the Fire Temple# is on the path to #Morpha#.
hinted_locations: Fire Temple GS Boss Key Loop

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that #the Bottom of the Well# is on the path to #Phantom Ganon#.
hinted_locations: Bottom of the Well GS Like Like Cage

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that #the Forest Temple# is on the path to #Volvagia#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that #Jabu Jabu's Belly# hoards #the Shadow Temple Boss Key#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: Can you move me? I don't get great service here.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that #the Spirit Temple# is on the way of the hero.
hinted_locations: Spirit Temple GS Hall After Sun Block Room

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that plundering #the Sacred Forest Meadow# is a foolish choice.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that #Jabu Jabu's Belly# hoards #the Prelude of Light#.
hinted_locations: Jabu Jabus Belly GS Water Switch Room

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that Anju needs to stop losing her chickens.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that plundering #Goron City# is a foolish choice.

LH (Lab).text: They say that #Bombs (5 pieces)# can be found at #Zora's Fountain#.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that a #storm near the castle# reveals a small #Fairy Fountain#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that lifting a #rock in the desert# reveals a #grave with a free chest#.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that #the Fire Temple# is on the path to #Phantom Ganon#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that the #northern basement of the Water Temple# contains...^ #the Gerudo Mask# and #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)#.
hinted_locations: Water Temple GS Near Boss Key Chest

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that a #storm within Gerudo's Fortress# reveals a #generic grotto#.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that ##the Sacred Forest Meadow## has #0# major items.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that plundering #Zora's River# is a foolish choice.

ToT (Left).text: They say that ##Lon Lon Ranch## has #1# major item.

ToT (Left-Center).text: I bet you'd like to have more bombs.

ToT (Right).text: They say that ##the Death Mountain Crater## has #0# major items.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that #Jabu Jabu's Belly# hoards #Saria's Song#.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that ##Gerudo Valley## has #0# major items.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that the #Desert Colossus# sands echo with #Arrows (5 pieces)#.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that #Dodongo's Cavern# hoards #the Spooky Mask#.
hinted_locations: Dodongos Cavern GS Vines Above Stairs

ZR (Near Domain).text: That's a nice wall you got there. Would be a shame if I just... clipped right through that.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that plundering #the Haunted Wasteland# is a foolish choice.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that leaping above the Market entrance enriches most children.
